title: load screen
body: went into a queue champs selected loading screen didnt come up 5 minutes later i lose 18 lp and low priority queue because my directx driver was out of date... i was just playing arma 3 and other games just fine... shouldnt have lost my lp or gone into low priority queue

replies.body:
Unfortunately, regardless of intent, your absence negatively impacts **everyone** in the match. This is a primary reason why the system treats all disconnections the same and why we're unable to modify the penalties associated with it.

If you need help sorting out that Directx error still, let me know.
